member.name: M:Logic.IAllVotesLogic.getVotesFromGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the allvotes, which has the voteGroup property set to the one provided in the input parameter
member.param: voteGroup id to look for
member.returns: A collection of allvotes that match the criteria

member.name: M:Logic.IAllVotesLogic.numberOfGroupParticipants(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the number of users, who participated in a specific vote group. (One user submitting multiple votes within the same group only counts as one)
member.param: Name of the vote group we're looking for
member.returns: The number of unique voters in the group, who participated by submittint at least 1 vote

member.name: M:Logic.IAllVotesLogic.numberOfVotesInGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Counts the number of votes submitted within one vote group.
member.param: The name of the group we're looking for
member.returns: The number of votes submitted within a group

member.name: M:Logic.IAllVotesLogic.IsVoteWon(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a vote would be considered as won at the moment. (According to the .pdf, a vote is won, when 1.) It has the most yes votes in it's voting group, AND 2.) 2/3 of the voters, who submitted a vote to this, or any other candidate in the same voting group, voted 'Yes' to this candidate.)
